name: Breakingnews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A news skill powered by artificial intelligence, delivers daily breaking news, world & local news, viral headlines, trending videos and articles directly to you!

Listen to daily updates from your favorite source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

Leave your feedback, your opinion matters a lot to us!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
